item.title: Three climbers feared dead on New Zealand's tallest mountain
item.description: Police believe the two Americans and one Canadian fall while crossing a ridge on Aoraki Mt Cook.

item.title: Biden considering pre-emptive pardons for Trump critics - sources
item.description: The outgoing president is reported to be weighing up ways to protect those the new administration may go after.

item.title: California shooting suspect used fake story to gain access to school
item.description: Two Kindergarten-aged children wounded in the shooting are in critical but stable condition, police say.

item.title: Worshippers flee arson attack at Melbourne synagogue
item.description: Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has called the fire an antisemitic "act of hate".

item.title: New photos released as NYPD hunt insurance boss killer
item.description: Police are still working to determine a motive in the slaying of insurance executive Brian Thompson.
